main.description: Membership record stored in the member's Personal Data Server (PDS). Represents a user's membership in a specific group with associated role and status.

group.description: AT-URI of the group config record (at://did:plc:owner/net.atrarium.group.config/rkey)

status.description: Membership status: 'active' for approved members, 'pending' for join requests awaiting approval

active.description: Whether membership is currently active (false = left group)

invitedBy.description: DID of user who invited this member (optional)

customTitle.description: Custom role title displayed in group (optional)
